name: Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon Special Demo Version
name_original: Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon Special Demo Version
description:
This is your chance to meet the Pokémon that can be found in Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon! Ash-Greninja, the Pokémon that appears with the hero Ash in the animated TV series Pokémon the Series: XYZ, will also appear in this game as a member of your team—you can adventure together!

You can bring Greninja, which is able to turn into Ash-Greninja, to your full version of Pokémon Sun or Pokémon Moon (after launch) once you've completed your adventure together in the Pokémon Sun and Pokémon Moon Special Demo Version.
